results.title: Metformin and sodium dichloroacetate effects on proliferation, apoptosis, and metabolic activity tested alone and in combination in a canine prostate and a bladder cancer cell line
results.text_hl: Based on these results, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might be a promising therapeutic agent for @SPECIES_9615 @@@canine@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Urogenital_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014565 @@@urogenital tumors@@@.
